author: m.kalinin
content: During yesterday's call there was a concern raised about introducing ILs into spec tests. My suggestion would be to extend the testing format by introducing  a new *optional* flag `inclusion_list_satisfied` (or any other name) to the `on_block` step (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/tests/formats/fork_choice#on_block-execution-step). This approach will work regardless of how exactly IL check is specced out
